dialogues.Text: Stop! Don’t move!
I told you to stay still!
Hey! Come back here, you thief!
Damn… He’s already gone.
I should go back to work… I hope my clients are not alarmed… I was kind of noisy…
Up next, local business news!
Today we will be talking about a restaurant that has been succeeding lately.
Its charismatic owner gave us the chance to share a lovely interview with him.
Welcome to our program!
It’s a pleasure.
WHAT!?
This can’t be true… How did he get there…? My restaurant is much more successful…
We finally made it.
All of these years trying new recipes and techniques have finally paid off.
What a wonderful place!
Without a doubt, this is a restaurant worthy of its fortune.
But… That place… Is completely brand new.
Wait a minute… That book in the back…
That’s my recipe book!
That book is my parents’ hidden treasure!
Having that book in his possession, he will discover all of my family’s cooking secrets…
Is that the reason why his restaurant is succeeding now…?
It can’t be. That doesn’t mean anything. That book won’t make him better than me.
I’ve been cooking those dishes for a long time… I obviously do it much better!
And that’s all! Please, say goodbye to the most wealthy and prosperous business in the city.
What a liar… My restaurant is so much better than that.
I’ll check the bills…
It can’t be…
The number of customers that come to my restaurant has been declining… Just like my income…
Then… What was announced on TV was true…?
No…
I can’t give up yet!
I have to keep going! I’ll do it for my parents!
I won’t let them down.
I’ll prepare everything for tomorrow.
I have… no money left…?
Oh, no…
So this is the end… Dad, mom…
I’m sorry…
